Description:
Uninterrupted Views on the 29th Floor - Capital Grand South Yarra!
Commanding an elevated position high within the LK Tower of the newly built 'CAPITOL GRAND', spectacular vistas across Melbournes iconic skyline, sports precinct and towards the picturesque Dandenong Ranges await the purchaser of this stunning residence. Architect designed by Bates Smart, Capitol Grand sets a new standard of luxury living complete with a New York style 24-hour concierge, 25 metre lap pool, spa, steam room, gym, massage room, dining/meeting room, 18 seat media room, 98 inch cinema screen, deck and a terrace with BBQ. Meticulously presented the residence boasts timber flooring, integrated cabinetry, an extraordinary expanse of glass showcasing breath-taking panoramas from each window, exquisite joinery and the finest materials. No expense has been spared regarding the interior design, offering a choice of living spaces to unwind and relax. The floorplan comprises of a Gaggenau equipped kitchen with natural stone finished benchtops, an expertly concealed dishwasher and fridge/freezer recess, soft-close drawers, expansive storage and an island bench overlooking the open plan lounge and dining domain which effortlessly flows to the wrap-around balcony. Three spacious bedrooms are enhanced by plush carpet and built in robes/walk in robes, the master suite presenting a palatial ensuite with freestanding bath. An additional bathroom, like the ensuite is encased in divine stone tile finishes. Four secure car spaces, two storage cages, ducted heating/cooling, a European laundry and lift access ensure the residents of this sumptuous home are catered for in complete style. Shop on Chapel Street, dine on Toorak Road or do both within your building, catch the train from South Yarra Station, the tram from your doorstep or cycle along the Yarra River bike trails. It is all here waiting for you!
